title: my.onCompassChange
content:
# my.onCompassChange

2022-07-03 18:44

Use this API to listen to the compass data change event. After the interface call, listening is automatically started. The callback interval is 500ms. You can use [my.offCompassChange](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_device_compass_offcompasschange) to stop listening.

## Sample Code

copy

```
my.onCompassChange(function (res) {
  console.log(res.direction);
})
```

## Parameters

The property is a callback function which uses object properties with the following property:

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Type** | **Description** |
| direction | Number | The degree of the direction that you are facing. |
